response.name: same plant code

item.description: user manufacturer can register will need to fill name, password country_origin, region_id, plant_code. when the user registers, the default authorization is false. Manufacturer must be authorized first by the admin after register.

item.description: Manufacturer can add new car lineups based on the models added previously by the user. user must input the model,vehicle code, security check digit and quantity for VIN number generation. note that manufacturer cannot add car models from diffrent manufacturer.

item.name: Recall

exec: pm.expect.fail("Response is not a json string");
pm.expect.fail("Response is not a json string");

item.description: Manufacturers can post recalls to the desired model. input the model and the cause of the recall.
All endpoints used for user type manufacturer. Manufacturer is the user that can add new model cars in the system and line up new vehicles based on their models.
